ProductInfo.Features:
With the portable receiver you can be anywhere in your home and clearly see who is at your door.
The CVMN-J20 receiver comes with large 3.4" color screen which allows you to see your entry way.
CMOS cam sensor for picture quality and 6 infrared lights to provide surveillance even in darkness.
The Entry Guardian easily installs and mounts outside your home for a one step security solution.
The CVMN-J20 is a universal intercom system and is compatible with most electronic door systems.
ProductInfo.Name: Security Portable Entry Guardian Wireless Video Door Phone (CMOS Sensor) - Remarkable videophone with sound System
